languages.text: {n}Цвета ксеноса похожи на сломанный калейдоскоп — глаза слезятся от одной попытки рассмотреть в нем хоть что-то, а голова еще больше раскалывается. И все же вы подсознательно понимаете, что темный лиловый туман, окутывающий гибкую фигуру, источает немыслимую опасность. А яркие проблески серебра указывают на то, что эта опасность — по крайней мере пока — направлена не на вас. Когда вы отводите взгляд и медленно выдыхаете, наваждение спадает, словно его и не было.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Цвета ксеноса похожи на сломанный калейдоскоп — глаза слезятся от одной попытки рассмотреть в нем хоть что-то, а голова еще больше раскалывается. И все же вы подсознательно понимаете, что темный лиловый туман, окутывающий гибкую фигуру, источает немыслимую опасность. А яркие проблески серебра указывают на то, что эта опасность — по крайней мере пока — направлена не на вас. Когда вы отводите взгляд и медленно выдыхаете, наваждение спадает, словно его и не было.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The xenos's colours are like those of a broken kaleidoscope — your eyes water at the mere attempt to pick any one thing out, and your head is splitting more than ever. Yet despite this, you are subconsciously aware that the dark lilac cloud surrounding the slender figure poses unspeakable danger. And that the bright sparkles of silver indicate that this danger — at least, for now — is directed at you. When you avert your gaze and slowly exhale, the vision falls away as if it was never there.{/n}

languages.text: {n}异形的颜色仿佛破碎的万花筒一样。每当你想要识别其中任何一种颜色时，你的眼睛都会流泪，头也比之前变得更加疼痛。但即便如此，你依然下意识地感觉到，这个苗条身影身边的淡紫色云层中，包裹着难以言说的危险。云层中迸发出明亮的银色火花，表明这种危险是针对你本人的，至少目前如此。你移开了视线，慢慢地喘着气。眼前古怪的景象渐渐消失了，仿佛从一开始就没有存在过。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's colours are like those of a broken kaleidoscope — your eyes water at the mere attempt to pick any one thing out, and your head is splitting more than ever. Yet despite this, you are subconsciously aware that the dark lilac cloud surrounding the slender figure poses unspeakable danger. And that the bright sparkles of silver indicate that this danger — at least, for now — is directed at you. When you avert your gaze and slowly exhale, the vision falls away as if it was never there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}异形的颜色仿佛破碎的万花筒一样。每当你想要识别其中任何一种颜色时，你的眼睛都会流泪，头也比之前变得更加疼痛。但即便如此，你依然下意识地感觉到，这个苗条身影身边的淡紫色云层中，包裹着难以言说的危险。云层中迸发出明亮的银色火花，表明这种危险是针对你本人的，至少目前如此。你移开了视线，慢慢地喘着气。眼前古怪的景象渐渐消失了，仿佛从一开始就没有存在过。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los colores del xenos son como los de un caleidoscopio roto: tus ojos lagrimean cuando intentas fijarte en un solo elemento, y la cabeza te duele más que en toda tu vida. A pesar de eso, tu subconsciente comprende que la nuble de color lila oscuro que rodea a la figura esbelta supone un peligro inimaginable. Y las relucientes chispas de plata indican que este peligro, al menos por ahora, está centrado en ti. Cuando apartas la mirada y exhalas lentamente, la visión desaparece como si nunca hubiera estado ahí.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's colours are like those of a broken kaleidoscope — your eyes water at the mere attempt to pick any one thing out, and your head is splitting more than ever. Yet despite this, you are subconsciously aware that the dark lilac cloud surrounding the slender figure poses unspeakable danger. And that the bright sparkles of silver indicate that this danger — at least, for now — is directed at you. When you avert your gaze and slowly exhale, the vision falls away as if it was never there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los colores del xenos son como los de un caleidoscopio roto: tus ojos lagrimean cuando intentas fijarte en un solo elemento, y la cabeza te duele más que en toda tu vida. A pesar de eso, tu subconsciente comprende que la nuble de color lila oscuro que rodea a la figura esbelta supone un peligro inimaginable. Y las relucientes chispas de plata indican que este peligro, al menos por ahora, está centrado en ti. Cuando apartas la mirada y exhalas lentamente, la visión desaparece como si nunca hubiera estado ahí.{/n}

languages.text: {n}異種族の色は壊れた万華鏡にように捉えどころがない。何かひとつを集中して見ようと試みるだけで目に涙が溜まり、頭の痛みで頭蓋骨が割れそうだ。にもかかわらず、ほっそりとした人物を取り囲む薄紫色の暗雲が、言いようのない危険を暗示していることに無意識に気づく。そして、眩い銀のきらめきは、少なくともこの瞬間だけはその脅威が自分に向けられているということにも気づく。目をそらしてゆっくりを深呼吸をすると、視界が幻影のように消えていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's colours are like those of a broken kaleidoscope — your eyes water at the mere attempt to pick any one thing out, and your head is splitting more than ever. Yet despite this, you are subconsciously aware that the dark lilac cloud surrounding the slender figure poses unspeakable danger. And that the bright sparkles of silver indicate that this danger — at least, for now — is directed at you. When you avert your gaze and slowly exhale, the vision falls away as if it was never there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族の色は壊れた万華鏡にように捉えどころがない。何かひとつを集中して見ようと試みるだけで目に涙が溜まり、頭の痛みで頭蓋骨が割れそうだ。にもかかわらず、ほっそりとした人物を取り囲む薄紫色の暗雲が、言いようのない危険を暗示していることに無意識に気づく。そして、眩い銀のきらめきは、少なくともこの瞬間だけはその脅威が自分に向けられているということにも気づく。目をそらしてゆっくりを深呼吸をすると、視界が幻影のように消えていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Farben des Xenos gleichen denen eines Kaleidoskops — deine Augen tränen bei dem bloßen Versuch, irgendetwas Separates auszumachen, und dein Kopfweh ist schlimmer denn je. Und dennoch ist dir unterbewusst klar, dass die dunkelviolette Wolke, welche die schlanke Gestalt umgibt, unaussprechliche Gefahr birgt. Und dass die hellen Silberfunken darauf hinweisen, dass die Gefahr auf dich gerichtet ist — vorerst zumindest. Als du den Blick abwendest und langsam ausatmest, verschwindet die Vision, als habe sie nie existiert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's colours are like those of a broken kaleidoscope — your eyes water at the mere attempt to pick any one thing out, and your head is splitting more than ever. Yet despite this, you are subconsciously aware that the dark lilac cloud surrounding the slender figure poses unspeakable danger. And that the bright sparkles of silver indicate that this danger — at least, for now — is directed at you. When you avert your gaze and slowly exhale, the vision falls away as if it was never there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Farben des Xenos gleichen denen eines Kaleidoskops — deine Augen tränen bei dem bloßen Versuch, irgendetwas Separates auszumachen, und dein Kopfweh ist schlimmer denn je. Und dennoch ist dir unterbewusst klar, dass die dunkelviolette Wolke, welche die schlanke Gestalt umgibt, unaussprechliche Gefahr birgt. Und dass die hellen Silberfunken darauf hinweisen, dass die Gefahr auf dich gerichtet ist — vorerst zumindest. Als du den Blick abwendest und langsam ausatmest, verschwindet die Vision, als habe sie nie existiert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les couleurs du xénos sont semblables à celles d'un kaléidoscope brisé. Les larmes vous montent aux yeux lorsque vous essayez de vous fixer sur l'une d'entre elles et la douleur dans votre tête redouble de violence. Malgré tout, vous savez inconsciemment que le nuage d'un mauve sombre entourant la silhouette élancée représente un terrible danger et que les scintillements argentés sont le signe que vous en êtes la cible... pour l'instant, tout du moins. Lorsque vous détournez le regard et exhalez lentement, la vision s'évanouit comme si elle n'avait jamais existé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's colours are like those of a broken kaleidoscope — your eyes water at the mere attempt to pick any one thing out, and your head is splitting more than ever. languages.text: {n}Zenonun renkleri, kaleydoskobu andırıyor. Tek bir rengi ayırt etme gayretin bile gözlerini sulandırıyor, başını daha da fazla döndürüyor. Yine de arz ettiği tehlikeyi anlatmaya kelimelerin kifayetsiz kaldığı zayıf figürü çevreleyen o koyu eflatun bulutun içten içe farkındasın. Parlak gümüşi kıvılcımlar ise bu tehlikenin en azından şimdilik sana yöneldiğini gösteriyor. Bakışlarını kaçırıp derin bir nefes vermenle birlikte bu görü, âdeta hiç var olmamışçasına ortadan kayboluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's colours are like those of a broken kaleidoscope — your eyes water at the mere attempt to pick any one thing out, and your head is splitting more than ever. Yet despite this, you are subconsciously aware that the dark lilac cloud surrounding the slender figure poses unspeakable danger. And that the bright sparkles of silver indicate that this danger — at least, for now — is directed at you. When you avert your gaze and slowly exhale, the vision falls away as if it was never there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zenonun renkleri, kırık bir çiçek dürbününün renklerini andırıyor. Tek bir rengi ayırt etme gayretin bile gözlerini sulandırıyor, başını daha da fazla döndürüyor. Tüm bunlara rağmen, arz ettiği tehlikeyi anlatmaya kelimelerin kifayetsiz kaldığı zayıf figürü çevreleyen o koyu eflatun bulutun içten içe farkındasın. Parlak gümüşi kıvılcımlar ise bu tehlikenin en azından şimdilik sana yöneldiğinin göstergesi. Bakışlarını kaçırarak derin bir nefes vermenle birlikte bu görü, âdeta hiç var olmamışçasına ortadan kayboluyor.{/n}
